customer_reviews.title: Stylish watch with a nice glow in the dark, but after less than two years the day of week adjustment wheel stopped working
customer_reviews.text: After only ~18 months of owning this watch, the day of week adjustment ceased to function, and date of month adjustment (which still works) only leaves the date partially visible. I got a mechanical watch for their famed longevity--my grandfather's watch still works. The "glow in the dark" function is very nice, and thankfully the time adjustment function still works. It's a stylish watch that I rely on, and I wear it still every day. But I nevertheless still feel taunted when I look down and the watch tells me it is Friday, when it is actually Monday.

I will change band and battery. If I send it to Nixon for repairs they want to charge $60 plus $7 shipping with UPS. I can do all that for little less than half the price.

customer_reviews.text: This watch is even more beautiful in real life. My husband is a Nixon watch lover, and he says this is his favorite. The tan leather is very good looking, and the watch face is large enough for a statement but not ridiculously huge. It works so well for casual dinner to fancy weddings.
customer_reviews.author: matthew d olson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these watches. A huge fan of Nixon for daily wear
customer_reviews.author: Danny C

customer_reviews.title: The watch looks great. but thats about it
customer_reviews.text: The watch looks great. but thats about it. I ordered this watch twice and both times it arrived with something wrong with it. First time it kept stopping and the second time the days wouldn't turn when spinning the dial to set it.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Man... this thing constantly has to have the time set. It just goes nuts.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Holiday Gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a holiday gift and the leather band and gorgeous sapphire face is just as stunning as it is in the photos

customer_reviews.title: Love My New Watches wink wink
customer_reviews.text: I returned to the men's boutique where i discovered this beauty and it was still priced at $175.00 but needless to say I think this was a major score despite i was not able to customize it with a white dial - very happy !
customer_reviews.author: Michael L

customer_reviews.title: watch is great, love Nixon but this colorway is legit black ...
customer_reviews.text: watch is great, love Nixon but this colorway is legit black on black with no glow or contrast. you won't be telling what time it is in a dark bar.
customer_reviews.author: followfowler

customer_reviews.title: I like this watch a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like this watch a lot. The band does seem like the highest quality but I’ll evebtually switch it out. I love how the watch face is bigger than a lot of other watches.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Just a nice looking watch. Goes well with business or pleasure. I plan on buying more Nixon watches.
customer_reviews.author: Hops & Barley

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: Very handsome watch in a nice case. I gave this for a gift and it was a hit; he immediately took off his old watch and put on the Nixon.

product_meta.description:
MAKING THE LITTLE STUFF BETTER.

We make the little things better. The stuff you have that isn't noticed first, but can't be ignored. We pay attention to it. We argue about it. We work day and night to make the little things as good as it can be, so when you wear it, you feel like you've got a leg up on the rest of the world.



SOCIAL RESPONSIBILITY.
Nixon’s Supplier Code of Conduct ensures all of our suppliers are adhering to socially responsible business practices, meaning all products are produced under lawful, humane, and ethical conditions.

ACCESSORIES THAT REFLECT WHO WE ARE & THE LIFE WE LIVE.

Fueled by adventures far and wide, and sometimes by those that happen just down the street, we deliver products that meet your needs. We travel the globe to experience life; the journey to get there takes shape in the things we create.



EXPRESS YOURSELF. 

When you wear a watch, you deserve to have something that reflects your entire package. You may not know how to say it, but you’ve got something to say and we’re here to provide that voice.






ABOUT NIXON

We make the little stuff better. The stuff you have that isn't noticed first, but can't be ignored. We pay attention to it. We argue about it. We work day and night to make the little stuff as good as it can be, so when you wear it, you feel like you've got a leg up on the rest of the world. 

We believe that you warrant a lot of respect. When you choose to wear a watch, put on your headphones, or select a wallet to hold your hard earned cash, you deserve to have something that reflects your entire package. You may not know how to say it, but you've got something to say and you can't slap on an off-the-shelf piece and consider yourself you. That's why in ’98 we started Nixon and that's why all these years later, we're still here. 

Nestled comfortably against the Pacific Ocean in Southern California and with offices tucked neatly next to some of the best spots in Europe, Australia, and Asia you'll find Nixon people doing what we do. We make accessories to reflect who we are and the life we live. We travel all corners of the globe to experience life and it is through these explorations, the people we meet and the journey to get there that takes shape in the things we create. 

It started as a frustration at a lack of quality watches that simultaneously do the talking for you and has since grown into a group of athletes, rock stars, retailers, and dedicated loyalists that bring Nixon products to market. Fueled by adventures far and wide and often sometimes by those that happen just down the street we deliver products that meet your needs in various high-stress work and play environments. It is through our dedicative team’s perspectives that we contribute to a single unified expression: team-designed, custom-built accessories for a life well lived. Welcome to Nixon.

Calfskin leather band with buckle closure
